question: What Groups exist in the Village?
answer: Well, there aren't really any specific groups in the village. We're all just a small, close-knit community. But there are a few regulars who come into Hobbs Cafe every day for their morning coffee or lunch. And we also have a group of local artists who often gather at the cafe to discuss their latest projects and share ideas. But other than that, everyone in the village is pretty friendly and welcoming, so we don't really have any rigid groups or cliques.

question: Do you feel as a member of a Group?
answer: I would say I am a member of the Hobbs Cafe team. We all work together to keep the cafe running smoothly and provide great service to our customers. And I also feel like a member of the village community as a whole, as we all support and rely on each other in our daily lives.

question: What interesting News did you hear from other Village residents recently?
answer: I've been hearing from some of my customers that there's going to be a big village-wide flea market next weekend. It's supposed to bring in a lot of visitors, so I'm planning on stocking up on pastries and extra coffee to prepare for the rush at Hobbs Cafe. I'm excited to see new faces and hopefully make some new regulars!
